title: listRest
name: listRest
description: Gets a list, without its first element.

arguments.name: delimiters
arguments.description: Characters that separate list elements. The default value is comma.

arguments.name: includeEmptyFields
arguments.description: if set to true, empty values are included as well

arguments.name: offset
arguments.description: specifies how many items to skip from the beginning of the list. default is 1.
